reviewText: Was exactly as shown...in DVD format. This also includes the music of the Mormon Tabernacle Choir singing songs like The Spirit of God, I am a Child of God, Love One Another, and Joseph Smith's First Prayer. There's both a CD and DVD version of this General Conference. If you're not sure what you're getting, contact the seller first.

These "DVDs" are in reality CDs, therefor not what was expected, and only audio files.
Nevertheless good to have them, but it would be nice to buy what is shown.
